title: Implement remove command - delete artifact files and update state
description: Delete artifact files from ~/.claude/skills/ or ~/.claude/commands/. Update state.json to remove the entry. Confirm before deletion.

title: Setup goreleaser for cross-platform builds and releases
Implement attune command - project setup and AGENTS.md generation
description: Create tome attune command that sets up a project for Tome usage by creating .config/tome/ directory and generating AGENTS.md with instructions for AI agents.

title: Implement learn command - fetch and parse artifacts from GitHub
description: Fetch artifacts from GitHub repos using the GitHub API. Parse SKILL.md files, command markdown files, and tome.yaml manifests. Support owner/repo, owner/repo:path, and direct URLs. Install to ~/.claude/skills/ or ~/.claude/commands/

title: Implement sync command - check for updates and download newer versions
description: Check installed artifacts against their sources for updates. Compare file hashes or git commits. Download and replace updated artifacts. Show diff of changes.

title: Setup homebrew tap repository for tome distribution
Rename commands to thematic alternatives (index, study, seek, renew, forget, edition)
Enhance learn command - auto-detect type, support multi-file repos
description: Auto-detect skill vs command based on filename (SKILL.md = skill, other .md = command). Support learning multiple files from a repo at once.

title: UI refresh - book/scrolls aesthetic for terminal output
Implement search command - GitHub search API integration
description: Use GitHub search API to find repositories containing Claude Code artifacts. Search for repos with SKILL.md files or tome.yaml manifests. Display results with interactive selection.
